author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Improves the Pixel Template and GenErrors Header Payload Inspector plots, by adding:
   * number of Template y entries
   * number of Template y-slices of x entries
   * number of Template x-entries in each slice
   * detector type (0=BPix, 1=FPix)
   * Charge scaling to match cmssw and pixelav
   * detector bias potential in Volts

In addition, introduce a class to display the template titles stored in the header.

#### PR validation:

Run with this branch the commands:
```python
 getPayloadData.py --plugin pluginSiPixelTemplateDBObject_PayloadInspector --plot plot_SiPixelTemplateHeaderTable --tag SiPixelTemplateDBObject38Tv3_express --time_type Run --iovs '{"start_iov": "326083", "end_iov": "326083"}' --db Prod --test ;
 getPayloadData.py --plugin pluginSiPixelTemplateDBObject_PayloadInspector --plot plot_SiPixelTemplateTitles_Display --tag SiPixelTemplateDBObject38Tv3_express --time_type Run --iovs '{"start_iov": "326083", "end_iov": "326083"}' --db Prod --test ;

```

obtained the following plots:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/107629964-2566fa80-6c63-11eb-9d36-76e7e8ae1a2e.png)

---

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/107637126-edb18000-6c6d-11eb-95aa-5defac831b6b.png)



#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport, no backport needed.
attn:
@tvami
title: Pixel Palyoad Inspector: improve the Template and GenError header plots
